item.description:
Announcing Exemplar?s Green Initiative:

Attend our first meeting to network with local ?Green? Entrepreneurs and businesses to discuss the issues facing emerging businesses with sustainable models, services, and products. Share advice and knowledge about everything from certifications, to fundraising, to marketing. Be sure to bring your business cards, ideas, and problems. See you there!

At this meeting you will have the opportunity to meet, collaborate and network with other "Green" and sustainable businesses to discovery opportunities to work together, partner, and support the development of an emerging industry!! Bring your ideas and challenges to the table and share them with other entrepreneurs in an engaging disuscussion on the issues facing Green businesses today!

See you then! Space is limited, so RSVP today!
item.name: Green Business Networking and Discussion Group
